snippet: The International Criminal Court’s chief prosecutor can immediately start a preliminary examination of war crimes allegations stemming from the Israeli-Palestinian conflict.
abstract: Fatou Bensouda, chief prosecutor of International Criminal Court, may start preliminary examination into allegations of war crimes and crimes against humanity committed on Palestinian lands by Israel.
lead_paragraph: The International Criminal Court’s chief prosecutor can immediately start a preliminary examination of war crimes allegations stemming from the Israeli-Palestinian conflict.

headline.main: Court Could Move Quickly on Israeli-Palestinian Case
headline.print_headline: Court Could Move Quickly on Israeli-Palestinian Case

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity
